version_description: - Correction du Coup d'oeil sur Apple Watch

The cooks of iSoft have concocted a new version 6.0 for iPhone and iPad so you can show off in front of friends who do not yet have the app.

An huge menu awaits you, I hope you're hungry:

- Lifting with elegant graphic effects, a new style and better readability
- New ergonomic menu
- New categories
- 3D Touch out and in-app to start a topic or quickly see an article
- Today improved Widget
- Improved memory management
- Tons of bugs
Bug fix

- Lots of performance improvements
- Spotlight search
- Widget fix

The chef has finally clean up its work plan. No more annoying bugs like the bad style comments or the Apple Watch unusable release.

Other elements were modified as the image bug gallery on articles, and the positioning of some of the illustrations in our articles.

Finally, the chef has finally shifted advertising. You won't see it at launch!

- iPad Pro support :)
- 3D Touch added to preview comments (peek wherever you want)

- Ad fixes
- Push fixes

- Bug fixes
- Minor Improvements

- Using the iPhone Taptic Engine 7
- IOS Widget 10
- 3 WatchOS
- Police tailored to your preferences systems
- Night mode accessible via a "shake"
- Less popup
- New animations
- Bug fixes (black screen, 3D Touch, sharing, device recognition, etc.)
- Code cleanup: lighter and faster

- Landscape mode supported
- Bugfix including push notif for iOS 10

The big update is still in with iOS 10, watchOS 3, new animations and more

- Bugfix for wallpapers saving

Don't forget previous release with landscape, iPhone 7, watchOS 3, new animations, etc.

We have worked well since the start of the school year: here is a new version with some interesting changes and corrections.

First, we note the arrival of Facebook Connect and the "Like" function for quick, very quick, enjoying our publications. Facebook Login is not mandatory, but do not hesitate to use it to "like" and also to avoid filling information to comment.

Then, on a night mode. It is really "dark" and rest your eyes well.

Finally, on we fixed the menu & also removed some haptic feedback on iPhone 7. It was a little too vibrant, I agree.

Anyway, thank you all for your encouragement and your downloads, we will soon pass the 1.5 million milestone !!!

- Opening links in Fullscreen on iPad
- Bugfix for Facebook Like

After a winter away from tactile keyboards, iSoft returns with some adjustments requested by our dear readers:
- Fixed bug opening articles from widget / notifications
- Possibility of selecting text in articles
- Possibility to open a shared link in the comments (a new picto appears when possible)
- Ads displayed less often

Summer has arrived, the opportunity for the Softy to improve to stay on top of the lot:
- Improved visibility of articles already read
- Night mode improved (and ability to block the "shake" to activate)
- Improvement of the widget's readability
- Correction of the dates on the articles
- Correction of sharing infos

iSoft has been preparing all the summer for the new iPhone X (and iPhone 8) with a code "clean" which is totally compatible with iOS 11 and the future versions but also to remove bugs.

To please you a little more, the app has tweaked its plastic with a more refined interface, softer colors as well as spacing and text sizes suited to different screen sizes. Thus, an iPhone X will not display exactly the same information as an iPhone 6 for example.

For the rest, we find performance upwards thanks to the use of the latest APIs from Apple. Most of the changes are under the hood!
iSoft is Ready for iPhone X !
Bugfixes for 3D Touch gesture and Night Mode

iSoft is ready for the summer with a sharp design, fewer bugs, more options like the ability to copy text from an article or third-party libraries updated for better compatibility.

See you on iPhoneSoft every day with dozens of new games, apps, rumors, news, tutorials, etc.

New alternative icon for Christmas !

We do some bugfix too !
Bug fixes for an excellent happy new year !
External links open now in Safari integrated browser

iSoft 7.0 is compatible with the new iPhone XS / XS Max and brings nice novelties:
- alternative icon (premium)
- enriched notifications
- increased stability (bye bye the bugs)
- a code cleaned for the winter
Bugfixes !

Three bugfixes :
- Crash on iOS 9
- Crash while saving image on iPad
- Image display on Watch extension

Softy returns with a much needed novelty: alerts to be notified of a new comment on a topic where you participate (option to activate).

Otherwise, the connection part has been revised to improve the general ergonomics.

Finally, the ad at the top of the posts has been moved down.

In addition, a pesky crash on iPad has been ousted. If you see him coming back, report it to us!

New alternative icon for Christmas !

We do some bugfix too !
All new version! Numerous graphic and ergonomic adjustments have been made to stick to the new iPhoneSoft visual identity.

iSoft is ready for the summer with a sharp design, fewer bugs, more options like the ability to copy text from an article or third-party libraries updated for better compatibility.

See you on iPhoneSoft every day with dozens of new games, apps, rumors, news, tutorials, etc.

iSoft now offers dark mode for free to celebrate iOS 13. The night mode setting still exists and allows you to force dark mode if your system is in clear mode.
For the rest, we fixed some bugs like the one of the size of characters on the articles.

iSoft improves the dark mode for iOS 13 (and older versions) with a real black background that fits your preferences. The night mode setting still exists and allows you to force dark mode if your system is in clear mode.
For the rest, we fixed some bugs around the dark mode as the persistence of your setting and the writing of comment that was not readable.
Several fixes for dark mode but also some improvements on UI in general.

- Improvement of the dark mode on all the application and in particular the settings screens which are fully compatible.
- Improved support for Voice Over.
- Fixed a bug that went back to the top of the article in multitasking.
- Fixed a crash on the list of articles.

Thank you to all our readers, ever more numerous and loyal!

Important version of your iSoft application with an update technique to prepare for the future. Code optimization, bookstore removal, SDK updates and more.

The result is a faster, more stable app.

Bonus: a black alternative icon for dark mode!

Important version of your iSoft application with an update technique to prepare for the future. Code optimization, bookstore removal, SDK updates and more.

iSoft is smoother than ever!

Display fixes for your favorite app as well as for Voice Over users.

Recall of the previous version:
Important version of your iSoft application with a technical update to prepare for the future. Code optimization, library removal, SDK updates, fixes and more.

iSoft is more fluid than ever!
Swipe left again to go back to articles list on iPhone.
Compatibility with iOS 14! The new widget is already available, and we have taken into account the new permission for advertising.
We've improved the widgets for iOS 14, as well as the iPad version and accessibility.
In addition to the iOS 14 widgets, we fixed the old widget and a bug on iPad.
To enjoy our widgets for iOS 14, we finally fixed an annoying bug on iPad Pro !
New version optimized for iPhone 12 and new Mac M1. We took the opportunity to correct some display issues in dark mode.
We fixed three crashes, removed the banner ad and improved some details like the detection of new Mac M1s.
Dark mode improved on the articles.
Spring update that improves readability on the iPad version and adds quick access to track keynotes!
Second spring version improving iPad layout!
Third spring update to fix the title "label label" issue and improvements to the dark mode in landscape.
